snippet: The measure, which would also prevent certain health plans from covering most abortions, advanced just one day after it was introduced during a meeting about an unrelated bill.
abstract: North Carolina Senate approves new limits on abortions, defying opponents who complained that the Republican majority breached protocol by passing restrictions less than 24 hours after their surprise introduction.
lead_paragraph: The measure, which would also prevent certain health plans from covering most abortions, advanced just one day after it was introduced during a meeting about an unrelated bill.

headline.main: Stricter Rules for Abortion Clinics Are Approved by State Senate in North Carolina
headline.print_headline: Stricter Rules for Abortion Clinics Are Approved by State Senate in North Carolina
